meanings.definition: The act or process of creating a texture.
meanings.sent1: The texturing of the clay gave it a rough feel.
meanings.sent2: The artist focused on the texturing of the painting to make it more interesting.
meanings.sent3: The texturing of the cake batter made it look like a fluffy cloud.
meanings.sent4: Her voice had a texturing that was as smooth as silk.
meanings.sent5: The texturing of the fabric was so intricate, it resembled a maze.

meanings.definition: The quality or appearance of a surface.
meanings.sent1: The texturing of the wall made it look like stone.
meanings.sent2: The texturing of the paper gave it a rough feel.
meanings.sent3: The texturing of the carpet made it seem like a field of grass.
meanings.sent4: His words had a texturing that was warm and inviting.
meanings.sent5: The texturing of the wood was so smooth, it felt like glass.

meanings.definition: The application of texture to something.
meanings.sent1: The texturing of the cake with frosting made it look like a work of art.
meanings.sent2: The texturing of the fabric with patterns added depth to the design.
meanings.sent3: The texturing of the ice cream with sprinkles made it sparkle like diamonds.
meanings.sent4: Her texturing of the garden with flowers created a beautiful landscape.
meanings.sent5: The texturing of the sculpture with intricate details brought it to life.
